name: control-traktor
description: A collection of settings and Max4Live devices for improved control over Traktor Pro.

scripts.build: npm run backup && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./scripts/dist.sh
scripts.postinstall: chmod a+x scripts/*sh && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run build
scripts.reinstall: rm -r dist && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run changelog && cp ./dist/* ./release
